original_text: As you go with your accuser before the magistrate, make an effort to settle with him on the way, lest he drag you to the judge, and the judge hand you over to the officer, and the officer put you in prison.
korean_text: 네가 너를 고발하는 자와 함께 법관에게 갈 때에 길에서 화해하기를 힘쓰라 그가 너를 재판장에게 끌어 가고 재판장이 너를 옥졸에게 넘겨 주어 옥졸이 옥에 가둘까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: As you go with your accuser before the magistrate
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 고발하는 자와 함께 관원에게로 갈 때에

sentences.original_text: make an effort to settle with him on the way
lest he drag you to the judge
and the judge hand you over to the officer
and the officer put you in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 그 관리가 너를 감옥에 가둘 것이라
